SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreModulesOptions] ( [CoreModulesOptions_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreModules_Ky] int NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_Code] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_Title] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_Type] varchar(50) NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_Description] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_Icon] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_Order] int NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_Default] varchar(200) NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreModulesOptions] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreModulesOptions PRIMARY KEY ([CoreModulesOptions_Ky])
